orego.mcts

Class WLSResponseMoveList

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.mcts.WLSResponseMoveList

  • public class WLSResponseMoveList
extends Object
    Simple container object which manages a list of moves, their associated WLS states, and a list of top K moves from this list. Each list of moves will be used in response to a given two move pair in WLSPlayer. You can examine Jacques' paper for further informatoin.
    Author:
    sstewart
